ActNon-smokers' Health Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the NON-SMOKERS' HEALTH REGULATIONS by repealing sections 3, 14 and 15 which allowed for the designation of smoking rooms and smoking areas in federal workplaces. Many Canadian provinces have already proceeded with the elimination, in their respective jurisdictions, of the dispositions permitting the designation of smoking rooms.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0233 Publication Date: 2007-11-14
